messages.update: Please visit here for detailed changelogs. Back up your worlds!!!

mod.name: Structures
mod.description: Spawn Structure

mod.name: MineTweaker Scripts
mod.description: Custom Scripts

mod.name: Chromaticraft Music
mod.description: This downloads the music files for chromaticraft. Done this way to ensure Divergence can be played without the need of off site file hosting. In case a link is blocked or goes down.

mod.name: Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by alot of mods.

mod.name: Forge Multipart
mod.description: Open source library for facilitation of multiple functional parts in the one block space.

mod.name: HardLib
mod.description: Core library

mod.name: Harder Ores
mod.description: Increased difficulty with mining and refining ores and the associated industry.

mod.name: HarderUnderground
mod.description: Stone no longer floats and other hazards of the underground spaces.

mod.name: Harder Wildlife
mod.description: Trees grow, animals die and reproduce, seasons come and go, crops take more time to grow.

mod.name: Expanded Industry
mod.description: Adds a handful of broadly useful tools for basic industry.

mod.name: Advanced Generators
mod.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU

mod.name: AE2 Stuff
mod.description: Various Extensions for Applied Energistics 2

mod.name: Another One Bites The Dust
mod.description: AOBD dynamically finds all the ores and ingots added by any mod and makes them processable in IC2, EnderIO, RailCraft, Mekanism, Thermal Expansion, Thaumcraft, UltraTech, Factorization, RandomAdditions and Gany's Nether machines!

mod.name: Amnesia Decorations
mod.description: This mod adds mechanical and decorative items to the game!

mod.name: AnimationAPI
mod.description: A supporting mod that allows modders to make animations more easily.

mod.name: AppleCore
mod.description: An API for modifying the food and hunger mechanics of Minecraft

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: A Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world..

mod.name: Armourers-Workshop
mod.description: Customize your Minecraft Char!

mod.name: Alternate Terrain Generation
mod.description: ATG provides an alternative to vanilla terrain generation.

mod.name: asielib
mod.description: Utilities for asie's mods

mod.name: AuraCascade
mod.description: A magic mod focused on emergent complexity and enabling unique designs

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: Beyond Reality Core
mod.description: Capes and things for Beyond Reality modpack.

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware, fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables, enchanted plates, map frames, and seats!

mod.name: Big Reactors
mod.description: Adds large, multiblock power generation machines to Minecraft. Compatible with Redstone Flux (RF) power.

mod.name: Binnie's Mods
mod.description: Various expansions for Forestry adding new bees and trees

mod.name: Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardry
mod.description: Rituals, spells, and more!

mod.name: Bookshelf
mod.description: Library of useful functions used by TeamBR

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft.

mod.name: Brandon's Core
mod.description: This is the core mod that will be used bu most of my mods from now on

mod.name: bspkrsCore
mod.description: Shared classes used in the mods maintained by bspkrs.

mod.name: Buildcraft
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mod.name: BuildCraft Additions
mod.description: BuildCraft Additions is a mod for Minecraft which extends BuildCraft in multiple ways.

mod.name: BuildCraft Compat
mod.description: Compatibility add-on for BuildCraft

mod.name: Builder's Guides
mod.description: Align All The Things!

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: CartFixes
mod.description: Fixes Steve's Carts

mod.name: Catwalks Mod
mod.description: Fast travel with cool-looking catwalks!

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: A mod that adds in many fancy blocks for decoration, which are crafted utilising the Chisel.

mod.name: Chisel Tones
mod.description: Chisel compatibility for Ztones

mod.name: ChromatiCraft
mod.description: ChromatiCraft is a large exploration-based magic mod centered around harnessing and focusing the power of the 16 colors of crystal energy

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Core library for all ChickenBones mods

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Core library for all ChickenBones mods

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: CoFH Core Module

mod.name: commons-codec
mod.description: Core mod for inpure

mod.name: commons-compress
mod.description: Core mod for inpure

mod.name: Compacter
mod.description: Rapidly compacts items that can be crafted in 2x2 or 3x3 pattern

mod.name: Compact Machines
mod.description: Allows you to fit many machines inside a single block

mod.name: Computronics
mod.description: A ComputerCraft/OpenComputers/NedoComputers addon mod.

mod.name: Cookie Core
mod.description: Libs for my mods.

mod.name: CraftHeraldry
mod.description: A mod that allows, as the name implies, to craft Heraldry in minecraft.

mod.name: Custom Ore Generation
mod.description: Allows the player to customize how ore is generated.

mod.name: Dark Menagerie
mod.description: A bunch of exotic creatrues that would very much love to kill you

mod.name: Decocraft
mod.description: Adds 500+ models to decorate your Minecraft world.

mod.name: Draconic Evolution
mod.description: Draconic Evolution is a mod that adds some extremely expensive high tier items to the game.

mod.name: DragonAPI
mod.description: DragonAPI is a function library and support mod which is relied upon by Reika's mods.

mod.name: DrCyano's Lootable Bodies
mod.description: Saves your items when you die in a container so that you can get your items back when you return.

mod.name: ElectriCraft
mod.description: An RC addon to make RC power easier to transport and store

mod.name: Enchiridion 2
mod.description: Custom books in minecraft!

mod.name: Eureka
mod.description: Core mod for BC Additions

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO, EnderZoo, and others

mod.name: Ender Spawn
mod.description: Unleash the power of the dragon again... and again, and again !

mod.name: Enhanced Inventories
mod.description: Enhancing your inventories!

mod.name: EnviroMine
mod.description: Adds more realism to Minecraft with environmental effects, physics, gases and a cave dimension.

mod.name: FluxPads
mod.description: Charging pads for RF items.

mod.name: Flood Lights
mod.description: Adds flood lights to Minecraft

mod.name: Forbidden Magic
mod.description: Forbidden Magic is an addon to add many dark-themed things to Thaumcraft.

mod.name: Forestry for Minecraft
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: ForgeRelocation
mod.description: Move blocks from one place to another

mod.name: ForgeRelocationFMP
mod.description: Adds FMP support to ForgeRelocation

mod.name: Growthcraft
mod.description: Growthcraft Core is as a mod which acts a central hub for the other mods. It will provide of resources needed in common by two or more Growthcraft mods.

mod.name: Growthcraft Bamboo
mod.description: Growthcraft Bamboo is a mod which adds a new plant to the game: bamboos, which focuses on construction rather food.

mod.name: Growthcraft Cellar
mod.description: Growthcraft Cellar is a mod which adds a new in-game hobby: brewing alcoholic beverages.

mod.name: Growthcraft Fishtrap
mod.description: Growthcraft Fishtrap is a mod which adds a block; Fishtrap, that automatically catches fish (and other stuff) for you!

mod.name: Growthcraft Grapes
mod.description: Growthcraft Grapes is a mod which adds a new totally crop to the game: grapes. It also comes with Wine-making.

mod.name: Growthcraft Hops
mod.description: Growthcraft Hops is a mod which adds a new crop to the game, hops. It also comes with Ale-brewing.

mod.name: Growthcraft Rice
mod.description: Growthcraft Rice is a mod which adds a new crop; rice. Alongside it also comes a new brew type; sake.

mod.name: Guide-API
mod.description: Simple mod guide creation.

mod.name: HEXCraft
mod.description: Technology and decoration mod inspired by XyCraft.

mod.name: Hardcore Questing Mode
mod.description: This mod will add Hardcore mode with extra lives. If you use up your lives, your world will be deleted or you will be banned.

mod.name: iBench
mod.description: The iBench is a replacement for the Dartcraft Clipboard with a few extras thrown in for good measure.

mod.name: Iguana Tinker Tweaks
mod.description: Rebalances and adds new features to Tinkers Construct

mod.name: Iguana Tweaks
mod.description: Various tweaks for vanilla

mod.name: Immersive Engineering
mod.description: A retro-futuristic tech mod!

mod.name: Immersive Integration
mod.description: Integrates IE with other mods, as well as some useful addition to IE itself

mod.name: In-Game wiki Mod
mod.description: Mod that allows for mods to add in-game documentation.

mod.name: IvToolkit
mod.description: Core Mod for Recurrent Complex

mod.name: Java Version Checker
mod.description: Nobody ever sees this!

mod.name: libsandstone
mod.description: Sandstone, the foundation for pyramids. Another modding framework.

mod.name: Lode Loader
mod.description: it loads lodes!

mod.name: Loot Bags
mod.description: Add loot pouches to entity drops

mod.name: Luppii's Ladders
mod.description: Ladders! Rope ladders hanging down. Sturdy ladders rising up. Dispensers shooting ladders up and down!

mod.name: Logistics Pipes
mod.description: Logistics Pipes is an extensive overhaul of the Buildcraft pipe system. It allows for better distribution of items via pipes,...

mod.name: MalisisCore
mod.description: MalisisCore is a framework dedicated to simplify many processes required during a mod development.

mod.name: Malisis' Doors
mod.description: Better doors!

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Shared code for Slime Knights mods and others.

mod.name: Magic Bees
mod.description: Magic themed bee expansion for Forestry. TC4, Botania, EE3, AM 2, TE 3

mod.name: Magneticraft
mod.description: Magneticraft Energy, Industries and Multiblocks!

mod.name: Matter Overdrive
mod.description: A mod that dwells within matter and energy.

mod.name: McJtyLib
mod.description: Companion mod for all mods by McJty (RFTools, Deep Resonance)

mod.name: MineTweaker 3
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: Mod Tweaker 2
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for MineTweaker 3.

mod.name: Model Citizens
mod.description: Allows placement of posable character models containing items.

mod.name: Modular Armour
mod.description: A Mod that makes a modular armour set, with upgrades

mod.name: Modular Systems
mod.description: Build it your way!

mod.name: MrTJPCore
mod.description: Core libs and utilities

mod.name: Mutant Creatures
mod.description: A mod that adds a few mutant mini-bosses of the original Minecraft mobs.

mod.name: NEI Addons
mod.description: Addons for Not Enough Items for various mods

mod.name: NEI Integration
mod.description: NEI handlers for all of the mods, one at a time.

mod.name: NotEnoughItems
mod.description: Allows you to quickly and easily look up recipes and uses for any item in Minecraft included modded items. Also allows easy spawning of items and a range of one click utilities.

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.authors: Florian 'Sangar' Nuecke,Johannes 'Lord Joda' Lohrer,Everyone who contributed to the mod on Github - thank you!
mod.description: This mod adds modular computers and robots that can be programmed in Lua.

mod.name: Open Modular Turrets
mod.description: All a man needs are meat ingots, and big ass turrets. Adds a heap of new turrets and upgrades!

mod.name: Ore Dowsing
mod.description: The Ore Dowsing mod provides items called Dowsing Rods which can help find ores and other blocks.

mod.name: PackGuard
mod.description: Monitors the modpack for user modifications, and tells the user to not report any errors if anything has been changed!

mod.name: Progression
mod.description: A mod that allows you to control the progression of individual players.

mod.name: Pistronics 2
mod.description: BETA-VERSION: Adds Pistons, Rotators and more.

mod.name: PneumaticCraft
mod.description: A technical mod all about pneumatics!

mod.name: ProjectRed Core
mod.description: Redstone. The way it was meant to be. Built against Forge 10.13.3.1399-1.7.10. Supporters: Jacob M

mod.name: ProjectRed Illumination
mod.description: Redstone enthusiasts' one-stop-shop. Illumination module for Project Red.

mod.name: ProjectRed Transmission
mod.description: Redstone enthusiasts' one-stop-shop. Integration and Transmission modules for Project Red.

mod.name: QuantumStorage
mod.description: A mod that adds a Deep Storage Unit to hold all the things

mod.name: Railcraft
mod.description: Redefine your rails

mod.name: Recurrent Complex
mod.description: Adds structures to worldgen, handles exporting and importing structures, and provides build tools.

mod.name: Redstone Arsenal
mod.description: Behold the Redstone (Flux) Revolution - provides Flux-Infused Tools and Armor!

mod.name: Reliquary
mod.description: Two words: magical swag. Oh, and a gun.

mod.name: Restricted Portals
mod.description: A mod that requires you to craft an item before allowing the player to enter the nether or end.

mod.name: RFTools
mod.description: RedFlux tools

mod.name: Roadblocks
mod.description: Inspired by Reddit user LupisX

mod.name: RotaryCraft
mod.description: My tech mod, RotaryCraft.

mod.name: Runic Dungeons
mod.description: Nearly Infinite Dungeon Dimension

mod.name: Sanguimancy
mod.description: A Blood Magic addon adding all kind of stuff

mod.name: SFArtifacts
mod.description: SFartictafs stand for Science Fiction Artifacts

mod.name: SimpleLabels
mod.description: Labels for the Deep Storage Unit, and more!

mod.name: SkinPort
mod.description: This mod adds rendering support for the new skin format introduced in minecraft 1.8

mod.name: Shamanry
mod.description: Adding Shamanry to Thaumcraft

mod.name: Simply Jetpacks
mod.description: Redstone Flux jetpacks and more

mod.name: Soul Shards: The Old Ways
mod.description: Continuation of Moze_Intel�s Soul Shards: Reborn mod.

mod.name: SquidAPI
mod.description: Modding API.

mod.name: Stacks on Stacks!
mod.description: A mod that adds ingot piles like those of Terrafirmacraft

mod.name: StartingInventory
mod.description: Allows you to define a list of items that will be given to the player when starting new worlds.

mod.name: Steve's Carts 2
mod.description: A carttastic mod adding a near infinite number of carts possible to the game, through the creation of modular carts.

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Super Crafting Frame
mod.description: Super Crafting Frame is a simple mod that helps with repetitive crafting tasks during early game.

mod.name: SquidUtils
mod.description: It's your game. Shape it in your way.

mod.name: Thaumcraft
mod.description: Adding a touch of magic to Minecraft

mod.name: Thaumic Energistics
mod.description: The digital age could use some magic

mod.name: Thaumcraft Gates
mod.description: A small mod that adds BuildCraft gates interaction with Thaumcraft blocks!

mod.name: Thaumic Upholstry
mod.description: A thaumcraft addon that adds armor upgrades!

mod.name: Thermal Dynamics
mod.description: Thermal meets Dynamic - provides options for transporting items, fluids, and Redstone Flux!

mod.name: Thermal Expansion
mod.description: Expanding Minecraft Thermally - provides new options for automation and processing!

mod.name: Thermal Foundation
mod.description: The foundation of a Thermally enhanced world!

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: Tinkers' Mechworks
mod.description: Mechanically inclined Tinkers' Construct expansion

mod.name: Tinkers' Steelworks
mod.description: A steel-based expansion for Tinkers' Construct. Now you're tinkering with steel!

mod.name: Traveller's Gear
mod.description: RPG Inventories! Armorstands! Cross-Mod Interaction! Woohoo!

mod.name: Tube Transport System
mod.description: Why should items get all the fun?

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: All your data are belong to us.

mod.name: WAILA Plugins
mod.description: WAILA plugins for various mods, such as Blood Magic, Magical Crops, and Forestry!

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: An add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at

mod.name: Wallpaper
mod.description: Decorate your house with the many wallpapers of this mod!

mod.name: Witchery
mod.description: Bringing witchcraft and nature magic to Minecraft: cauldrons, broomsticks, ritual circles, magical brews, a bit of necromancy and voodoo for good measure; all topped off with a fetching pointy hat. Oh, and watch out for the demons...

mod.name: Witching Gadgets
mod.description: It's a kind of magic

mod.name: Ye Gamol Chattels
mod.description: Adds a number of mostly decorational items to the game, with a focus on keeping the Minecraft aesthetics both visually and thematically.

mod.name: YuutoLib
mod.description: Core mod for enchanced Inventories

mod.name: Ztones
mod.description: Decorative Blocks

mod.name: ======= Choose your mode =======
mod.description: You must pick one

mod.name: Hard Mode (Default)
mod.description: The default mode for Divergence

mod.name: Easy Mode
mod.description: Easier Set of recipes for research

mod.name: ======= Client Side Mods =======
mod.description: Below is a list of client side mods. That should have very little impact on preformance

mod.name: BetterFps
mod.description: Performance Improvements

mod.name: FastCraft
mod.description: FastCraft optimizes MineCraft in various ways, visit the homepage for further details and support.

mod.name: INpureCore
mod.description: Core mod for all INpure mods

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: SimpleAutoRun
mod.description: Simple hotkey for Autorun

mod.name: Sound Filters
mod.description: Adds reveb to caves, as well as muted sounds underwater/in lava, and behind walls.

mod.name: Thaumcraft NEI Plugin
mod.description: NEI Integration for Thaumcraft 4.

mod.name: TC Node Tracker
mod.description: Tracks scanned nodes for Thaumcraft

mod.name: TiC Tooltips
mod.description: A simple client-side add-on for Tinkers' Construct that adds relevant stats to all tool part tooltips.

mod.name: VoxelMap No Radar
mod.description: Voxelmap is a Minimap that has been packed to the brim with features -Works properly in the Nether -Supports most custom Forge blocks -Teleport to waypoints if you have permission -Press "Z" to change map zoom level -Press "X" to toggle large map -Press "M" to bring up the minimap menu

mod.name: == May impact your preformance ==
mod.description: Below is a list that may have a impact on preformance. Not Recommened for older systems!!

mod.name: Divergence Resource Pack
mod.description: A resource pack for Divergence. This could effect your FPS

mod.name: Better Foliage
mod.description: Leafier leaves and grassier grass. This could effect your FPS

mod.name: EiraIRC
mod.description: Connect your server or client to IRC and Twitch Chat and easily share your screenshots with other players.

mod.name: EiraMoticons
mod.description: Adds emoticons to the Minecraft chat. Supports Twitch and custom emotes. Compatible with EiraIRC.

mod.name: IC2 Backpack HUD
mod.description: Provides visual armor HUD. This could effect your FPS

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore. Compaired to Voxel map This could effect your FPS

mod.name: Not Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to NEI

mod.name: === Needed for Kcauldron Server's ===
mod.description: Below is a list of client side mods. Red colored mods will impact your preformance ~FPS~.

mod.name: EnviroFix
mod.description: A quick fix for status values reset after death on Cauldron servers using Enviromine Mod. DO NOT INSTALL unless you are playing on a cauldron server.

mod.name: BNBGamingLib
mod.description: Shared library between all BNBGaming mods.

mod.name: Default Keyconfig
mod.description: A way for modpacks to ship a default key configuration without having to include an options.txt file.

mod.name: Just a Few Fish
mod.description: Adds a few fish, to go along with the vanilla items!

mod.name: LaunchGUI
mod.description: Creates a GUI at the start to be customized how you wish.

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: Suspended Server
mod.description: Suspends the server while no players are online.
